basic_info.name: Narasaraopeta Engineering College Admissions
description: NEC admissions are done on the basis of marks obtained in the relevant entrance examination. Candidates seeking admission in B.Tech must have passed AP EAMCET exam. However, students can also take admission through management quota, based on marks in their intermediate graduation.
Similarly, M.Tech admissions are done on the basis of rank obtained in GATE. For MBA and MCA, the college provides admission on the basis of APICET rank.

basic_info.name: Narasaraopeta Engineering College Placement 2024
description: The college has a dedicated placement cell which looks after the employment needs of the students. It not only organizes guest lectures from industry experts but also provide personal guidance for students contemplating higher studies. The cell is known to have entrepreneurship guidance programs, faculty development programs, and mock interviews.

Section.name: About NEC
Section.description:
Narasaraopeta Engineering College (NEC), established in 1998, is located in Narasaraopeta. It is sponsored by Gayatri Educational Development Society. The college is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada and accredited by NBA as a Tier-1 college. It is an autonomous institute which is accredited by NAAC with an ‘A+’ Grade.
NEC is ranked 3rd ​under “Top Private Institutions in Andhra Pradesh 2024” by Times Engineering Institutes, 138th by The Week under “India’s Best Private Engineering Colleges 2024” and it stood at the 190th place (All India) in India Today Rankings 2024. Further, Narasaraopeta Engineering College has been recognised for Excellence by the Times Business Award, 2024 (6th Edition). The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses namely B.Tech and M.Tech under various specializations.
Narasaraopeta Engineering College has strong links with some of the biggest peer universities, institutes, and companies at the national and international levels, which in return help in enhancing the research quality and enriching its educational programs. It also provides excellent placement opportunities. In 2024, more than 1297 students were placed, and the highest and average packages reported are INR 14.5 LPA and INR 4.5 LPA respectively.

NEC admissions are done on the basis of marks obtained in the relevant entrance examination. Candidates seeking admission in B.Tech must have passed AP EAMCET exam. However, students can also take admission through management quota, based on marks in their intermediate graduation.
Similarly, M.Tech admissions are done on the basis of rank obtained in GATE. For MBA and MCA, the college provides admission on the basis of APICET rank.
The college has a dedicated placement cell which looks after the employment needs of the students. It not only organizes guest lectures from industry experts but also provide personal guidance for students contemplating higher studies. The cell is known to have entrepreneurship guidance programs, faculty development programs, and mock interviews.
